title: Baby Corn Fried Rice ğŸ› | Street Style| Vegan
content:
Lunch Recipe: Baby Corn Vegetable Fried RiceÂ  Servings: 3 Duration: 20 minsÂ  One of the most comforting, warmth and tasty food is fried rice. You can make it in anyway or with different kind of spices and sauceâ€™s it turns out super yummy and delightful dish. Today, I prepared a simple and quick meal for lunch is Baby Corn Fried Rice ğŸ›Â which exactly looks and tastes same like street side fried rice!Â You will agree with me if you try this beautiful recipe. As I said, fried rice can be made in version so I added veggies, homemade Frankie Masala Powder is always available in my kitchen shelves along with black pepper powder and salt. Tossing rice on pan is a crucial part of any fried rice I hope you will definitely try and enjoy ğŸ˜Š â€œFrankie Masala Powder - Recipe link given at Ingredientsâ€ Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Baby corn - 1 tin - chopped
  • Salt - 1 teaspoon
  • Black Pepper Powder - 1 teaspoon
  • Chilly vinegar - 1 table spoon ( you can also substitute with white vinegar
  • Frankie Masala Powder | HomemadeÂ - 1 Tb sp
  • Green chilly - 1 sliced
  • Coconut oil - 2 Tb sp ( you can replace it with regular cooking oil or butter)
  • White Sona Masoori Rice - cooked - 200 gms
Finely chopped:
  • Carrot ğŸ¥•Â - 1
  • Beans - 8
  • Red Capsicum / Bell Pepper - 1/2 cup
  • Yellow Bell Pepper - 1/2 cup
  • Garlic - 3 cloves
  • Coriander leaves - 1/2 cup
  • Spring onion greens - 1/3 cup
Procedure:
  • On medium heated pan add oil, garlic and green chilly. SautÃ© 30 seconds and then add chopped baby corn
  • Saute 2 minutes and add chopped carrot and beans, sautÃ© 2 more minutes and then add red and yellow bell peppers
  • Stir more 3 minutes and then add salt, Black Pepper Powder andÂ Frankie Masala Powder
  • Combine well and add cooked rice and chilly vinegar
  • Gently mix and toss rice on medium-high heat for 2 to 5 minutes
  • Turn off heat and finally add chopped cilantro and spring onion greens
  • Mix well and serve hot with sliced onion, lemon ğŸ‹Â ğŸ˜‹
  • Happy Cooking and Have a great day â˜€ï¸ğŸŒ
